resources.string: The page is a reading list sharing the best books to read in various categories based on many hours of reading and research. You will find more than 100 good books to read, organized by category. This is a reading list for people who dont have time for unimportant books. I only list the best books to read in each category. You can be sure that each one is fantastic and will be worth your time. Want to keep things simple? Check out the 10 Best lists under the Start Here section to get some great book recommendations without feeling overwhelmed by all the options.
